nodes.text: Hollace Davids was the co-author of The Jedi Prince young-reader series along with her husband, Paul. Hollace grew up in Silver Spring, Maryland and attended Goucher College and Boston University. In 1971, she met her future husband, Paul, in Harvard Square in Cambridge, after a screening of the George Lucas film, THX-1138. The Davids have two children together, Jordan and Scott.
